org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net

Class EncryptedPeer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.net.EncryptedPeer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Peer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class EncryptedPeer
extends Object
implements Peer
    Represents a peer that we communicate with by using an encrypted communications medium.
